EASTER-ROZZELLE
v.
CITY OF CHARLOTTE 52PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2017 Lawrence J. Goldman, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for City of Charlotte. Steven B. Hayes, Attorney at Law, Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Easter-Rozzelle, David. Edward L. Pauley, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of January 2017 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of January 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
